name: Super Treasure
description:
This game was made for the GBJam8 Objectives:
  • Avoid the lava
  • Get higher score than the dev :) (2368)

The score is the sum of the coins and the distance covered.

Controls:
KeyboardGamepadMoveA, D, arrow keys left and right
Dpad left and right
JumpSpace, K
A (xbox), X (ps)
Double jump
Press Jump button in mid air
Press Jump button in mid air
PauseEscapeStartUI move
W, S, arrow keys up and down
Dpad up and down
UI select
Space, K
A (xbox), X (ps)

You can play with a gamepad in the web version (tested with a Xbox One controller).

Tools used:
  • Godot 3.2.2
  • Aseprite
  • Sfxia
  • Sfxr
